name: Quest for the Shaven Yak starring Ren Hoëk & Stimpy
name_original: Quest for the Shaven Yak starring Ren Hoëk & Stimpy
description:
Quest for the Shaven Yak starring Ren Hoëk & Stimpy is a platformer game. It was originally released in 1993.
You can play Quest for the Shaven Yak starring Ren Hoëk & Stimpy on SEGA Master System.
